50 }] constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { nfts: this.dummyData, height: 0 }; this.onImgLoad = this.onImgLoad.bind(this); } onImgLoad({target:img}) { let currentHeight = this.state.height; if(currentHeight < img.offsetHeight) { this.setState({ height: img.offsetHeight }) } } render() { return (
{this.state.nfts.map( (nft, index) => (
{ nft.deadline &&
